Good food, good prices, service with a smile. What more could you ask for? If I'm in the area again, I'll definitely be back.
Accommodating to vegetarians, food was SO good, fair prices and amazing service
Eduardo shows the most positive energy and the desire to make you the food you really want.
I found this place on a morning walk and what a gem! Good food, very personal, friendly service. The owner treats everyone like a friend. Food portions are on point too!

If I could give this place a 10* review I would! Hospitable! Very friendly (hens its name) fast and delicious. Reasonable pricing. The owner is very hardworking and kind. The food is delicious I got the French toast special. Everything was fresh.
Good food/coffee, fair prices, and the guy who runs it is cool. If you're staying in the area, get breakfast at this place every day.
Es muy caro la comida es buena pero demasiado caro no lo recomiendo
Delicious food, fast service and welcoming staff!
Great restaurant. tried 2 different entrees, both were mindblowing, portions were generious. We talked with Eduardo owner. He is a great guy. Recommenf this place to anyone visiting the town

Eduardo, the guy behind the counter is a local legend and a gem in the neighbourhood. The place has been around for more than 20 years. The food is absolutely delicious. I was only visiting the city so I could go twice but I hope more people visit them and enjoy their food. 10/10 would recommend.
FYI today is thanksgiving day so they are also doing free turkey giveaway.
Excellent quality food, fast and friendly service. The name does not lie, I am very Happy with Happy Coffee Shop
The most expensive eggs in New York.  Got two eggs bacon and small chicken salad for $32.  Unbelievable. Deli quality
Very clean, food tastes amazing and its not super expensive! I had a breakfast meal since it was my first time hearing about it! Definitely recommend people to try it!
Friendly employees
Comida fresca
Great food and service!!
Un muy buen sitio para comer.
Very nice place for fast work coffee and a brake fast on the go..

I recently had the pleasure of dining at this delightful Mexican diner, and I cannot stop raving about the delicious tacos. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and the service was impeccable. The tacos were bursting with flavor, and the quality of the ingredients really shone through. I especially loved the variety of options available. From the tender meat to the fresh toppings and zesty sauces, each bite was a burst of authentic Mexican goodness. The prices were reasonable, making it an excellent value for the quality of food. I highly recommend this spot to anyone craving genuine Mexican flavors in a cozy, friendly setting. I will definitely be returning for more of those amazing tacos!

Had a nice lunch. Chicken burrito with avocado salad. Nice and fresh ingredients. Better than any fast food otherwise available nearby.
This place is the best.

This place was beckoning as I was waiting for 2 hours across the street for my replacement window. I went in and immediately struck gold. It was 10am and I saw that they were mostly of spanish origin and were cooking traditional Mexican‚Ä¶
great service and cute place the food was delicious

First time ordering from here. Great fresh food and delicious!  Got more French toast than expected:) bacon and medium eggs was good. Order came fast than I expected. The coffee was FRESHLY brewed and made exactly how I wanted. Will recommend this restaurant and order again.

Good selection, good food, $8.00 for a small soup & 8oz cup of white rice way over priced.
I get see paying that price in the City but in the hood ???
I‚Äôve been a customer for over  4 years. The place is great both food and staff. The price is reasonable but the quality is even better. Highly recommended

Food is delicious but it is just the price that doesn't  help. It is too expensive, as other customer commented before. The restaurant is located in East New York, Brooklyn...Just for this reason price should be a little cheaper.
Delicious!! Reasonable prices with plates full of food. Clean and friendly environment and the food is FRESH. Did I mention delicious!!
